name: Oslo Sleek Flat Roof DIY Carport Plan 12x26 – Open-Concept Shelter with Storage Shed
open_features: 24×24×18 in concrete footings with (4) #5 rebar each way
6×6 SP No.2 posts with Simpson ABU66Z post bases
Rafters: 2×8 SP No.2 @16 in O.C. with Simpson H2.5A hurricane clips
Roof: 1/2 in APA rated sheathing, nailed 10d @6 in edge / 12 in field
4 in reinforced concrete slab with vapor barrier over termite-treated soil
Shed framed with 2×4 studs @16 in O.C., double top plate, 2×4 sill, (2)2×8 headers
safety_note: Plans are preliminary; local permitting, engineering, and compliance review required before construction.
